data.title: IKEA Etobicoke - Furniture & Home Décor Store
data.meta_description: Visit your IKEA Etobicoke store. Shop affordable furniture and home furnishings, enjoy authentic Swedish food and take part in our free events and workshops. Check out opening hours, offers and more!
data.text:
IKEA Etobicoke

Hej! (that's how we say hello in Swedish)

If you need stylish furniture, affordable home furnishings, original home décor ideas, and a stress-free day of family-friendly fun, come visit us soon at the IKEA Etobicoke store!

IKEA Etobicoke

Etobicoke

M8Z 1T3

Visited our store recently?

Help us create a better IKEA experience, give us your feedback

Sustainable and accessible transportation information

Parking lot entry routes

Enter and exit IKEA Etobicoke via The Queensway or Fordhouse Blvd.

Loading zone

Designated loading/unloading zone with a 15-minute limit, located near store exits.

Electrical vehicle (EV) chargers

8 EV chargers located on the lower deck parking.

Bike Racks

Limited bike racks available on upper deck.

Public transit

Access from Kipling Station via TTC Line 2, Route 44, Route 80.

Parking

Over 1500 parking spaces available, including Accessible and Family spaces.

Electric shopping carts and wheelchairs

Electric shopping carts and wheelchairs are available at the store entrance.

Planning your visit

We speak your language! Ask a coworker in yellow to help find one of our diverse co-workers in-store that can help communicate with you in your language. Some languages spoken: ASL, English, Hindi, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Spanish, Tagalog, and Ukrainian.

Download the IKEA app to save time while shopping in-store. Learn more about Shop and scan.

Småland: Socks are required for entry into Småland play area.

IKEA Etobicoke payment options.

Exchanges and returns

Save time and book an appointment, or join the virtual line for your return, prior to arriving at the store.

Looking for replacement parts? Are you missing bolts, pegs or other hardware parts to assemble IKEA products? Request free replacement parts online and they will be delivered to you. Click here to order replacement parts.

Learn more about our return policy.

Click and collect service

You can shop for it in store – but you don’t have to. Starting at $5, you can place an order online and collect it at the IKEA Etobicoke store.

IKEA Family members enjoy free Click and collect at the IKEA Etobicoke store. Not a member yet? Join now – it's quick, easy and free.

View information on how to order.

View pick-up instructions.

Happening right now

See what's happening at your local IKEA store. Shop affordable home furnishings, enjoy an authentic Swedish food experience and our special offers for IKEA Family members only.

What's going on in your local IKEA store

All year round, we offer various activities and events. For example, workshops on the layout of the house, or activities for children during school holidays. Check our events regularly…we add them all the time.

View events

Click and collect

You can shop for it in store – but you don’t have to

Contactless Click and collect service is available at select pick-up locations nationwide. Starting at $5, you can place an order online and collect it from your local IKEA store or an external Pick-up location.

Get free Click and collect with IKEA Family!

IKEA Family members enjoy free Click and collect for online orders at the IKEA Burlington, Etobicoke, North York, Scarborough Town Centre, and Toronto Downtown stores only. No minimum purchase is required.

Learn more about Click and collect

Join IKEA Family – it's quick, easy, and free.

Here’s how you do it:

Step 1: Choose ‘Click and collect’ at checkout and you will be able to select an IKEA Store or a nearby Pick-up location, operated by a third-party partner.

Step 2: Wait until you receive the “Ready for pickup” email before heading to the store.

Step 3: Follow the instructions in the email and proceed to your selected store or Pick-up location. Pick-up processes may vary from location to location. Further direction will be communicated upon arrival.

Click and collect pick-up instructions:

Step 1: Park on the upper-level parking.

Step 2: Enter the store and follow the signage to the Click & Collect Desk.

Step 3: Check-in at the Click & Collect Desk.

You will need your confirmation email and government-issued photo ID to collect your order.

Our services

You can do everything yourself, but you don’t have to. We offer a range of services to make your life easier. To learn about all the services we offer, visit the services page.

IKEA co-workers' career journeys: Greater Toronto Area

Ever wonder what it's like working for us? Watch our co-workers across the GTA talk about their IKEA journeys. Find out what makes IKEA Canada one of the best employers as ranked by Forbes.

We’re a diverse group of down-to-earth, enthusiastic, hard-working people with a genuine willingness to work and grow together. We respect each other, our differences, and are open to everyone contributing.

So much more than a job.

Build your career with IKEA.

About the IKEA Etobicoke furniture store

IKEA Etobicoke is an affordable furniture store and home goods destination in the Etobicoke metropolitan area. A great place to find everything you need to refresh your home & kitchen, including kitchen cabinets and new appliances, bedroom furniture, dining room furniture, living room furniture, home office furniture and outdoor furniture. Come for the day and visit the Showroom to explore inspiring home furnishing solutions, whether you have a small apartment or a large house. Enjoy browsing Market Hall and shop for stylish home décor and modern home accessories for every room in your home. Also, be sure to stop by the IKEA Etobicoke Restaurant or Swedish Food Market to enjoy Swedish meatballs, plant-based meals, hot dogs, and other affordable foods. At IKEA Etobicoke, you'll have the perfect day out.
